Description.Text:
Position The hotel is situated in Cesenatico Ponente, near "Porto Canale".
Restaurant Air conditioned breakfast room
Outside
Lobby
More Informations Last refurbishment took place in 2010.
Sweet and salty buffet breakfast.
Credit cards accepted: Eurocard / Mastercard, American Express and Visa.
The hotel has a conference room that can accommodate up to 150 persons.
The pool is open from 31/05/14 to 06/09/14 (limited hours: 09:00 am - 06:00 pm).
Underground car parking with limited availability.
The hotel has a Beauty Center available with supplement to pay in spot, with: whirlpool, sauna, turkish bath and lamp u.v.a.
Check in: by 04.00 pm. / Check out: within 10.00 am.
